description.raw:
@tfoote and I resolved conflicts with gazebo8 in 2ec6ecb and also tried to make sure the Windows compatibility improvements are retained. I also fixed some whitespace and minor style issues in f1c07dc. We'll let CI run to make sure things are ok, but I'll wait for @tfoote to merge.

Update: I removed the line from CMakeLists.txt that sets `ENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION` in d4b83eb, since that causes a hard cmake failure now and tests are not built by default anyway. Use `make tests` now to build tests before running `make test`.
description.html:
@tfoote and I resolved conflicts with gazebo8 in 2ec6ecb and also tried to make sure the Windows compatibility improvements are retained. I also fixed some whitespace and minor style issues in f1c07dc. We'll let CI run to make sure things are ok, but I'll wait for @tfoote to merge.

Update: I removed the line from CMakeLists.txt that sets ENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION in d4b83eb, since that causes a hard cmake failure now and tests are not built by default anyway. Use make tests now to build tests before running make test.

title.raw: Merge ardupilot with gazebo8 (update to pull request #2450)
